original_title: Johannes Koller - Mein schönes, böses, altes Haus
overview: In the house, Koller has exposed old courses, brought up to fourteen wallpaper layers on the walls to light,with the love and care of a conservator, discovered hidden fireplaces; in the course of these activities, he found old enigmatic garments and the skull of a child and as he says a strange collection of bizarre and ritual objects.
title: Johannes Koller - Mein schönes, böses, altes Haus
